name: Strawberry Milkshake

ingredients.name: vanilla ice cream and plain 2% Greek yogurt
Strawberry Margarita Mix or Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix

preparation: Slice and discard stems from fresh strawberries.
Measure strawberries, ice cream, yogurt, milk, and mix into a blender. Blend on high until smooth.
Divide between two chilled glasses and garnish rim with strawberry, if desired.
tips: To chill glasses, rinse with cold water and freeze for 10 minutes.
For an Epic Life friendly dessert, make mini shakes. One shake will serve two Epic friends!
